name: Möbius (LK13)
description:
When you decided to meet your friend in the subway station in the middle of the night, you knew something bad is going to happen. But you didn't expect you would be stuck in a time loop dying over and over again, not having a clue why it's happening.  Will you be able to escape the time loop? Or will you be stuck here forever?

Möbius is a first-person horror game that includes some clue-finding elements. 

*Jumpscares are included.

*This is a mini-game made in 4 weeks. The solution is in the video. Enjoy.
